Package presentation.views

Interface UIManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsoleUIManager
public interface UIManager
Interface that abstracts the UI implementation by providing certain functions to use when interaction with the user is needed.

  • Method Details

    • showStartingMenu

      DataMenuOptions showStartingMenu()
      Method that prompts the user to select the persistence method
      Returns:
      an item in the DataMenuOptions enumeration representing the option chosen by the user

    • showLoadingData

      void showLoadingData()
      Method that shows the user a loading data message.

    • showDataSuccessfullyLoaded

      void showDataSuccessfullyLoaded()
      Method that shows the user a message indicating that the data has been successfully loaded.

    • showRevertMessage

      void showRevertMessage()
      Method that shows the user a message indicating that the system is reverting to local data.

    • showMainMenu

      MainMenuOptions showMainMenu(int numCharacters)
      Method that shows the program's main menu to the user, asking them to choose an option.
      Parameters:
      numCharacters - an integer representation of the number of characters in the system
      Returns:
      an item in the MainMenuOptions enumeration representing the option chosen by the user

      Parameters:

      results - an array of int representation of the dice results.
      sums - an array of int representation of the sum of the dice results.

      Method that shows the encounters menu to the user, asking them to choose an option.
      Parameters:
      optionEncounters - int representation of the encounter currently being displayed
      encounter - the encounter currently being displayed
      numEncounters - int representation of the number of encounters in the adventure
      Returns:
      an item in the EncounterMenuOptions enumeration representing the option chosen by the user

      Returns:

    • showParty

      void showParty(int i, int party, String[] partyNames)
      Method that shows the user the current condition of the party.
      Parameters:
      i - an int representation of the encounter in which we want to add some characters.
      party - an int representation of the number of encounters that will take place.
      partyNames - an array of strings representing the character's names at the party.

      an int representation of the character to add according to the list.

    • showRoundAndHP

      Method that shows the user the current round and the HP of each character
      Parameters:
      counterRound - an int representation of the current round
      adventureParty - an arrayList containing all the characters in the party

    • showCombatAction

      void showCombatAction(int hit, int damage, ArrayList<Character> adventureParty, Encounter encounter, int i, String actionString)
      Method that shows the user the information about the combat action
      Parameters:
      hit - int representation of the dice roll, indicating whether the attack was successful or not
      damage - int representation of the damage dealt
      adventureParty - ArrayList of characters that are playing the adventure
      encounter - Encounter that is being played
      i - int representation of the combatant that took the action
      actionString - String representation of the action taken

    • endOfRoundMessage

      void endOfRoundMessage(int counterRound)
      Method that shows the user the message "End of round"
      Parameters:
      counterRound - int representation of the current round

    • showExperienceGain

      void showExperienceGain(Character character, int xpGained, boolean levelUp, boolean evolved)
      Method that shows the user a message indicating that the character has gained experience and, if applicable, has leveled up
      Parameters:
      character - Character that is dead
      xpGained - int representation of the experience gained
      levelUp - boolean indicating whether the character has leveled up or not
      evolved - boolean indicating whether the character has evolved or not

    • showShortRestActions

      void showShortRestActions(Character character, int healing)
